name: NPBees2
title: NPBees Redux
author: kaueNP, micromario
description: Get metals from bees! Breed and use genetic mutation to create massive insect swarms. Production lines start from honey bees, and slowly become ores. The mod is designed to be very dynamic, and it will search for all mineable ores in your mod list. Goes well with angels and seablock. Graphics courtesy of kaueNP.
